title: Rural Health AI Diagnostics Initiative
description: Deploy AI-enabled diagnostic tools to expand healthcare access in rural communities, focusing on early detection and preventive care protocols.

grant_details.objective: Improve rural healthcare access through AI diagnostics
grant_details.methodology: Deploy mobile diagnostic units with AI-powered screening
grant_details.sustainability_plan: Train local healthcare workers for ongoing operation
